title: शाहरुख खान को लंदन के हीथ्रो एयरपोर्ट पर गिरफ्तार किये जाने की ग़लत खबर हुई वाईरल|
author: www.factcrescendo.com
vclaim: Not one for telling anyone how they should be…or do what should be done…or what this year & future made to be. I have so many frailties myself…that I wish may the future be kind to all of us…& we be who we are. May Allah be kind to us inspite of ourselves. Happy New Year pic.twitter.com/IJr82PrQuF
